alert.note: Alert for Falls; Limestone; Milam; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 10:10PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Robertson, northeastern Milam, south central Limestone and southeastern Falls Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1010 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bremond, or 12 miles southeast of Marlin, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marlin, Hearne, Franklin, Calvert, Bremond, Twin Oak Reservoir, Kosse, Milano, Crossroads, Jones Prairie, Elevation, Hanover, Baileyville, Reagan, New Baden, Highbank, Pleasant Grove, Wheelock, Branchville and Gause. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
